item.title: Don’t Top Post…
item.description:
…[it makes reading your hilarious internal memos annoying][1].

I guess top-posting is mostly Microsoft’s fault anyway. Ironically, while Gmail encourages top-posting as well, its conversations view of messages is just a fancy way of fixing top-posting. Inline is your friend.

[1]: http://blog.seattlepi.nwsource.com/microsoft/library/vistaexhibitsone.pdf
